sections.MISSION: 3/2 CR conducts Medical Training on 27NOV23-08DEC23 on PA-256-S and the MSTC IOT reaffirm confidence and validate soldiers' proficiency in treatment and exchange operations.
sections.KEY TASKS:
- Conduct accountability each day in front of Kronos Troop, in Squadron Parking Lot
Leader’s recon of range and coordination with aircrew
Issue OPORD and disseminate info. Train SM’s on LZ’s site selection and marking Conduct aircraft familiarization Conduct ground and hoist exchange operations Safely execute training on PA256s Transport soldiers to the MSTC and conduct medical training
sections.END STATE:
All designated soldiers are qualified and familiarized with either ground Cas Evac or air Med Evac procedures, soldiers successful execute MSTC training.
Medical Conskills 1 – Formation in Front of Kronos Troop at 0900 Everday
